pr_title: CreateTable component should use given connection

timeline.message: CreateTable component should use given connection

timeline.bodyText:
I don't think it is specific for tCreateTable and we already have another constructure
public RepositoryReviewDialog(Shell parentShell, ERepositoryObjectType type, String repositoryType, String[] itemFilter) , itemFilter is used to filter the repository item to select .
If can't reuse this constructor , you can refer to this implementation.
timeline.author: wchen-talend

timeline.bodyText:
https://github.com/Talend/tdi-studio-se/blob/master/main/plugins/org.talend.designer.core/src/main/java/org/talend/designer/core/ui/editor/properties/controllers/PropertyTypeController.java#L342
Can we reuse the code in PropertyTypeController instead of here ?
timeline.author: wchen-talend
